thread.title: A look at 5 virtual reality games using Oculus Touch - The New Zealand Herald
thread.title_full: A look at 5 virtual reality games using Oculus Touch - The New Zealand Herald - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The New Zealand Herald
title: A look at 5 virtual reality games using Oculus Touch - The New Zealand Herald
text:
The virtual reality creator invited attendees at its second annual Oculus Connect conference to go hands on with games for the consumer rendition of its Oculus Rift headset using Oculus Touch hand-held controllers. "The biggest challenge for us to solve was adding support for dual controllers," said Nick Donaldson, senior designer at Epic Games.
 The New Zealand Herald.
